text: Egha gɨn Moses Josuan diazɨ, a iza gumazamiziba bar men damazimɨn tu. Ezɨ Moses kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ tugh gavgavigh egh atiatingan markɨ. Nɨ gumazamizir kabar faragh mangɨ, me inigh mangɨ nguazir Ikiavɨra Itir God, en inazir afeziabar anɨngasa akam akɨrizir kamɨn aven mangam. Egh nɨ men akurvaghtɨ me a iniam.
